input.sentences: [female] and her friend at a big meal before the race .
the cyclists all gathered at the start line .
the bikes raced down the road .
afterwards | she and her friends posed by the sign . they did it !
output.sentences: My best friend and I enjoyed a meal before the race.
We all started at the line.
We raced our bikes on the road.
Had a lot of fun watching the female racers.
At the end my friends and I took a picture by the sign.
